temperature.name: temperature
temperature.help: Temperature of the model affects the creativity of the model. 0.0 is the most deterministic, 2.0 is the most creative.

gemini-2.0-flash.name: Gemini 2.0 Flash
gemini-2.0-flash.description: Old model, not recommended for new tasks.

gemini-2.5-flash.name: Gemini 2.5 Flash
gemini-2.5-flash.description: Our best model in terms of price-performance, offering well-rounded capabilities. 2.5 Flash is best for large scale processing, low-latency, high volume tasks that require thinking, and agentic use cases.
